CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Research Hub relative to Meridian Academy Collection?
SRP.A: Borealis Research Hub is {below} Meridian Academy Collection in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Academy Collection relative to Borealis Research Hub?
SRP.A: Meridian Academy Collection is {above} Borealis Research Hub in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Academy Collection relative to Zenith Tech Library?
SRP.A: Meridian Academy Collection is {above} Zenith Tech Library in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total library visits?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Celestial College Archives}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total library visits?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Meridian Academy Collection}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Celestial College Archives's minimum Library Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Celestial College Archives's minimum Library Visits is in {1965}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Academy Collection's maximum Library Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Academy Collection's maximum Library Visits is in {1964}.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1985, was the average total Library Visits higher or lower than between 1969 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total library visits between 1977 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1969 and 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1983, did the total Library Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1966 and 1984?
NC.A: The change in total library visits between 1980 and 1983 was {smaller} than between 1966 and 1984.

NC.Q: Was the total Library Visits in 1977 higher or lower than in 1982?
NC.A: The total library visits in 1977 was {lower} than in 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1980, did the total Library Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1968 and 1987?
NC.A: The change in total library visits between 1975 and 1980 was {smaller} than between 1968 and 1987.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Celestial College Archives} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Celestial College Archives and Meridian Academy Collection first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Celestial College Archives and Meridian Academy Collection first exchanged leading positions in {1966}.
